General.Name: Sihui Fuji Electronics Technology Co Ltd
General.Description: Sihui Fuji Electronics Technology Co., Ltd. engages in the manufacture of printed circuit boards worldwide. It offers printed circuit boards (PCB); complex PCBs, including rigid, flexible, thin, laser drilling, multi layer, copper and aluminum core, heavy copper, metal core PCBs, and high frequency, rigid flex, high density, and long boards; and PCB assembly parts. The company was founded in 2009 and is based in Zhaoqing City, China.
General.Address: No.2 Electronics Industrial Zone, Zhaoqing, China, 526236
